label: ABC2_hP8_194_a_c_f-005
title: Hexagonal Delafossite (CuFeO$_{2}$) Structure
comments: Delafossite appears in two forms which differ in the stacking of the layers: \href{current_web_home_dir/ABC2_hR4_166_a_b_c-004}{rhombohedral, prototype CuFeO$_{2}$}, and hexagonal, shown here.  Most of the structures found in the hexagonal phase can also be found in the rhombohedral structure (Marquardt, 2006).
